Name: Reese
Information: Damage scale used to classify residential masonry field survey data
Comments: The damagage scale is presented in Table 4 of Reese et al. 2011.

Name: EMS 98 RC
Comments: Damage scale for reinforced concrete buildings (p. 16).

Name: Modified MLIT
Information: Fused DS6 and DS7 of the MLIT damage scale into a single DS6&7
Comments: Described in Section 3.1 (p. 1257-1258) of De Risi et al. 2017a.

Name: Paulik
Information: Scale for damage after the 2018 Sulawesi earthquake (Mw 7.5) and tsunami
Comments: The damagage scale is presented in Table 1 of Paulik et al. 2019.
